mapper.select: select * from mt_store t where t.NAME = #{name}

select * from mt_store where ID in
#{id}

SELECT t.id,(6371 * ACOS(COS( RADIANS(#{latitude}))*COS(RADIANS(t.latitude))*COS(RADIANS(t.longitude ) - RADIANS(#{longitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{latitude}))*SIN(RADIANS(t.latitude)))) AS distance FROM mt_store t WHERE t.status = 'A'
AND t.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,1000
